attributes.title: Biben 2020

attributes.title: :( boo

i got this app bc i wanted to support president trump i luv him smmmm wowie he's amazing ✨ the app kept crashing and i think it broke my phone overall it did not tell me news just propaganda and i kept seeing random oranges and cheeto puffs?? you might want to fix that glitch 🥰 anyways that app sucked  it did not do its job so i have to give it a 1 star rating. if it was possible i would give it lower because i really really really didn't like this app. it was not helpful

attributes.title: Settle for Biden 2020
attributes.review: This app is awful and brought more viruses to my phone than pornhub. Like it gave my phone corona and my phone gave it to me and I died. So I definitely don’t recommend to anyone. Unless you’re a white supremacist, homophobic, racist, sexist, or transphobic, then get the app and let natural selection do its work.
